user.title: LG ESS Power Converter / Energy Storage
user.description:
Connect to an LG ESS energy storage / power converter system. 

 **password has to be fetched via the device wifi**.

 on device wifi run
```
pip install pyess
esscli --action get_password
```

data.name: Name of the device (should be autodetected, printed on the label on the side of the device)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect, make sure that you are on the same network as the ESS and try again.
error.invalid_auth: ESS reports that there is something wrong with the password.
